trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The well-dressed noblewoman wishes to make an apology.
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the fearful fugitive.
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_TODO_01<tab>Report to the well-dressed noblewoman.
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the letter of contrition to the fearful fugitive.
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_MADAM03541_000_001<tab>Oh, I-I'm not here to cause trouble! I've simply come to pay a visit to one of Amity's residents.
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_MADAM03541_000_002<tab>A former maidservant, in fact, to whom I owe a belated apology. But now that I've finally found her, I find myself beset with unease...

TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_MADAM03541_000_003<tab>Before I approach, I need to know her state of mind─how does she feel now about Eulmore? About me? I would appreciate any insight that might better prepare me for what I must do...
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_MADAM03541_000_004<tab>Pray find my former maidservant, and ask for her thoughts on Eulmore. She's a young and pretty Hume girl, with hair the color of the palest rose...
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_FRIGHTENEDGIRL03541_000_011<tab>Hello again, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. Was there something...?

TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_FRIGHTENEDGIRL03541_000_012<tab>You...want to know how I feel about Eulmore and my former masters? I thought I made that quite clear the last time we met: the very mention of that place leaves me shaking in terror.
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_FRIGHTENEDGIRL03541_000_013<tab>It is a terrible city filled with terrible people, who care for naught but indulging their basest instincts...
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_FRIGHTENEDGIRL03541_000_014<tab>Eulmore was a nightmare from which I've escaped in body only. I long for the day my mind is released from this fear...
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_MADAM03541_000_020<tab>And? What did she have to say of Eulmore...?
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_MADAM03541_000_021<tab>...Trembles at the very mention of it? Well, I suppose that is to be expected.

TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_MADAM03541_000_022<tab>'Tis all true. We lived in decadent abandon, seeking only to fulfill our whims and appetites. And when <var 1A 02 /var>she<var 1A 01 /var> became the object of my husband's desires, a jealous rage consumed me. All I could think of was making her suffer...
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_MADAM03541_000_023<tab>With Lord Vauthry gone, 'tis almost as if a fog has lifted from my mind. How clearly I see now the awful person I had become.
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_MADAM03541_000_024<tab>My husband, too, regrets his behavior. He has made his apologies...and it is time for me to make mine.
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_MADAM03541_000_025<tab>...Yet it seems a sudden confrontation may be ill-advised.
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_MADAM03541_000_026<tab>Anticipating such, I have penned a brief letter to explain my intentions. Pray deliver this to the girl─I shall be waiting at Top Rung.
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_FRIGHTENEDGIRL03541_000_030<tab>A letter? For me?
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_FRIGHTENEDGIRL03541_000_031<tab>...Good gracious, this is from my old mistress!

TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_FRIGHTENEDGIRL03541_000_032<tab>(-Letter of Contrition-)<var 1A 02 /var>My dear girl, you served my husband and me with unrelenting diligence. And we repaid your efforts with vulgarity and violence, wounding you in heart and body alike.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_FRIGHTENEDGIRL03541_000_033<tab>(-Letter of Contrition-)<var 1A 02 /var>I am deserving of your hatred. Of your fear. Words of apology can do little to salve the suffering I've caused, yet I would speak them nonetheless. I await your pleasure at Top Rung...<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_FRIGHTENEDGIRL03541_000_034<tab>......
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_FRIGHTENEDGIRL03541_000_035<tab>Am I to believe she has changed so dramatically...?
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_A1_000_001<tab>She seemed sincere...
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_A1_000_002<tab>Vauthry's society brought out the worst in people...
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_FRIGHTENEDGIRL03541_000_036<tab>Hm. I'm not entirely convinced...but I will at least hear what she has to say.
TEXT_LUCKZI005_03541_FRIGHTENEDGIRL03541_000_037<tab>Oh, and this is for you─her ladyship included a token of thanks for her “mediator.” I suppose I should be on my way...
